column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////We always order the same thing -- Spicy Tonkatsu
column5: and a seasoned egg and takoyaki to start. The takoyaki is the best I've had anywhere
column6: and I love the egg that's at the base. Don't miss out on that! The ramen is absolutely impeccable. There's nothing else to describe it. Pork melts in your mouth
column8: and that broth...ugh. Every bite is heaven all the way through and the egg
column10: is on my list of best things in the world.
